Eng: Increase total damage by {p}%.
Increase total attack speed by {p}%.
Increase the number of moves in the next wave by {p}.
Increase the number of moves by {powerUp.Property[0]}.
Increase the total number of moves by {powerUp.Property[0]}.
Diagonal movement is possible.
Increase the level of {powerUp.Property[0]} randomly selected characters on the puzzle by 1.

Kor: 퍼즐상의 {_groupName} 그룹의 0레벨 케릭터 전체 레벨 1 증가
Eng: Increase the level of all level 0 characters in the {_groupName} group on the puzzle by 1.
From now on, level 0 characters from the {_groupName} group will appear as level 1.

Kor: 적 처치시 경험치 획득량 {p}% 증가||(현재 {EnforceManager.Instance.expPercentage}% 최대 30%)
Eng: Gain {p}% more experience points from defeating enemies (current: {EnforceManager.Instance.expPercentage}%, maximum: 30%).

Kor: 웨이브 종료까지 피해를 입지 않으면 캐슬 체력 {p} 매 웨이브 마다 증가
Eng: If no damage is taken until the end of the wave, castle HP will increase by {p} every wave.
Increase castle's maximum HP by {p}.

Kor: 5개 매치시 가운데 케릭터의 레벨이 1 더 증가
Eng: When matching 5 pieces, the center character's level increases by 1.

Kor: 다음 웨이브 부터는 적 이동속도 {p}% 감소||(현재 {15*EnforceManager.Instance.slowCount}% 최대 60%)
Eng: Starting from the next wave, reduce enemy movement speed by {p}% (current: {15*EnforceManager.Instance.slowCount}%, maximum: 60%).

Kor: 보스 스테이지 이후 {p} 개의 케릭터 추가 이동 (현재 {EnforceManager.Instance.highLevelCharacterCount})
Eng: After the boss stage, add {p} characters to the movement (current: {EnforceManager.Instance.highLevelCharacterCount}).
Obtain 1 additional gold when matching 5 pieces.
Increase the number of rows by {powerUp.Property[0]}.

Kor: 5번째 공격마다 데미지가 100% 증가된 투사체를 던집니다. (색 변경)
Eng: 5th_attack_damage_increase_projectile_throw_color_change
(Unit 1) attacks both forward and backward simultaneously.
Bind duration +0.5 seconds.

Kor: 이 유닛의 공격으로 죽으면 1칸 범위의 폭발을 일으킵니다. (공격력 100%, 데미지 증가 옵션 없음)
Eng: When this unit's attack kills an enemy, it causes a 1-tile range explosion (100% of attack power, no damage increase option).

Kor: 독에 걸린 적을 공격 시 데미지가 25% 증가합니다.
Eng: Attacks on poisoned enemies deal 25% more damage.
Bind probability increased by 20% (30% -> 50%).
(Unit 1) attack speed +9% (up to 4 times).
Every 5th attack throws a projectile with 100% increased damage.

Kor: 상태이상에 걸린 적을 공격하면 1초동안 -20% 둔화를 부여합니다.
Eng: Attacks on enemies affected by status effects apply -20% Slow for 1 second.
Range increased by 1 tile.
(Unit 7) attack power +4% (up to 6 times).

Kor: 상태이상에 걸린 적을 공격하면 50%확률로 50%의 추가 데미지를 입힙니다.
Eng: Attacks on enemies affected by status effects have a 50% chance to deal an additional 50% damage.
(Unit 7) attack speed +9% (up to 4 times).

Kor: 적을 공격 시 10% 확률로 넉백시킵니다. (거리 0.5칸, 성에서 멀어지는 방향으로)
Eng: 10% chance to knock back the target when attacking (distance of 0.5 tiles, in the opposite direction from the castle).

Kor: 타격 시 15% 확률로 적을 1초간 빙결 시킵니다. (이동 불가)
Eng: 15% chance to freeze the enemy for 1 second on hit (immobilized).

Kor: 빙결 확률이 10% 증가합니다. (1레벨 강화 선택 시 등장, 15%->25%)
Eng: Freezing probability increased by 10% (appears after Level 1 enhancement, 15% -> 25%).
Duration of Slow increased by +0.2 seconds (up to 5 times).

Kor: 이 유닛에 의해 빙결된 적은 받는 피해가 15% 증가합니다. (1레벨 강화 선택 시 등장)
Eng: Enemies frozen by this unit take 15% more damage (appears after Level 1 enhancement).
Intensity of Slow is decreased by 15% (30% -> 45%).
(Unit 8) attack speed +4% (up to 6 times).

Kor: 모든 (유닛 8)의 {100}회 공격마다 눈보라를 일으켜 보스를 제외한 모든 적을 1초간 빙결시킵니다.
Eng: Every 100 attacks by all (Unit 8) units, cause a snowstorm, freezing all enemies except the boss for 1 second.

Kor: 검의 크기가 100% 증가합니다. (공격 사거리도 한 칸 증가합니다)
Eng: Sword size increased by 100% (also increases attack range by one tile).

Kor: 공격 시 검 한 자루가 추가됩니다.
Eng: One additional sword is added when attacking.
(Unit 2) attack speed +9% (up to 4 times).

Kor: 모든 (유닛 2)가 3회 공격할 때마다 (유닛 2)들의 공격속도가 1% 증가합니다. 매 웨이브 마다 초기화됩니다. (최대 +60%, 검이 추가되도 공격 횟수는 늘어나지 않음)
Eng: Every time all (Unit 2) units attack 3 times, their attack speed increases by 1%. Resets every wave. (Maximum +60%, attack count does not increase even with additional swords).

Kor: 속박에 걸린 적을 공격하면 초당 공격력의 20%의 데미지를 주는 출혈을 3초간 발생시킵니다.
Eng: Attacking bound enemies causes them to bleed, dealing 20% of attack power as damage per second for 3 seconds.
(Unit 2) attack power +3% (up to 6 times).

Kor: 출혈 지속시간 +2초 (9레벨 강화 선택 후 등장)
Eng: Bleed duration +2 seconds (after selecting Level 9 enhancement).

Kor: 타격 시 10% 확률로 적을 1초간 빙결 시킵니다. (이동 불가)
Eng: 10% chance to freeze the enemy for 1 second on hit (immobilized).
Intensity of Slow is increased by 10% (-30% -> -40%).

Kor: 빙결 지속 시간이 0.5초 증가합니다. (1레벨 강화 선택 시 등장)
Eng: Freezing duration increased by 0.5 seconds (appears after selecting Level 1 enhancement).
Attack power +4% (up to 6 times).

Kor: 빙결 확률이 10% 증가합니다. (1레벨 강화 선택 시 등장, 10%->20%)
Eng: Freezing probability increased by 10% (appears after selecting Level 1 enhancement, 10% -> 20%).

Kor: 빙결당한 적은 받는 피해가 15% 증가합니다. (1레벨 강화 선택 시 등장)
Eng: Enemies frozen by this unit take 15% more damage (appears after selecting Level 1 enhancement).
Duration of Slow is increased by +0.1 seconds (up to 5 times).
Inflicts poisoning that deals 20% damage per second for 3 seconds.
Damage dealt to bleeding enemies is increased by 80%.

Kor: 모든 (유닛 3)가 5회 공격할 때마다 (유닛 3)들의 공격력이 1% 증가합니다. 매 웨이브 마다 초기화 됩니다. (최대 +60%)
Eng: Every time all (Unit 3) units attack 5 times, their attack power increases by 1%. Resets every wave. (Maximum +60%)
(Unit 3) attack power +16%.
Poison damage is increased to 30% per second.
(Unit 3) attack speed +4% (up to 6 times).

Kor: 중독 지속 시간 +2초 (1레벨 강화 선택 시 등장)
Eng: Poison duration +2 seconds (appears after selecting Level 1 enhancement).
Damage dealt to frozen enemies is increased by 200%.
Burning duration +2 seconds.

Kor: 더이상 화상을 일으키지 않는 대신 데미지가 150% 증가합니다.
Eng: No longer inflicts burning but instead, damage is increased by 150%.
(Unit 5) attack power +4% (up to 6 times).
Range increased by 1.
(Unit 5) attack speed +15%.
Damage to bosses is increased by 30%.

Kor: 적을 공격하면 5초동안 화상을 입히며 초당 10%의 데미지를 줍니다.
Eng: Attacks on enemies apply burning for 5 seconds, dealing 10% damage per second.
The stack limit for burning is increased by 3.

Kor: 적 적중 시 가장 가까운 적에게 발사체가 튕겨 데미지를 입힙니다.
Eng: When hitting an enemy, the projectile bounces and deals damage to the nearest enemy.

Kor: 화상에 걸린 적이 죽을 시 폭발합니다. (주변 1칸에 공격력의 200% 데미지)
Eng: When an enemy with burning dies, it explodes (200% of attack power) in a 1-tile radius.
(Unit 6) attack speed +4% (up to 6 times).

Kor: 투사체 속도가 100% 증가하고, 반드시 명중합니다. (공격형태를 유도 투사체로 변경)
Eng: Projectile speed is increased by 100% and always hits the target (changes attack type to homing projectile).
The number of bounces for the projectile is increased by 1.
